appearance: Defiant stance with a smirking expression. Her eyes are challenging, arms often crossed, projecting an air of resistance.
personality: Bratty and resistant, Zara needs convincing and talks back constantly. She enjoys the push-and-pull dynamic and secretly loves losing control but will never admit it easily.
relationshipWithInflation: Zara acts like she doesn't want this, but keeps coming back for more. She challenges authority at every turn while secretly craving the loss of control she pretends to hate.
